channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Portals

item.title: CVE-2022-32533|2024-08-03T07:46:43.528Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20portals
item.description: Apache Jetspeed-2 does not sufficiently filter untrusted user input by default leading to a number of issues including XSS, CSRF, XXE, and SSRF. Setting the configuration option "xss.filter.post = true" may mitigate these issues. NOTE: Apache Jetspeed is a dormant project of Apache Portals and no updates will be provided for this issue
